about.title: Who We Are
about.subtitle: We are a team of <bold>young technology enthusiasts</bold>, graduates of the <bold>Faculty of Automatic Control and Computer Science</bold> at Politehnica University of Bucharest, dedicated to transforming ideas into high-performance digital solutions.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: We formed as a team at <bold>Politehnica University of Bucharest</bold>, Faculty of Automatic Control and Computer Science, where our <bold>passion for technology</bold> united us and motivated us to create together.
story.paragraph2: We have diverse experience - we've worked in <bold>large corporations</bold>, <bold>dynamic startups</bold>, and as <bold>independent freelancers</bold>. This variety of experiences has given us a unique perspective on the needs of different types of businesses.

philosophy.title: Our Vision
philosophy.paragraph1: We believe that <bold>modern technology</bold> can transform any business. We focus on <bold>process automation</bold> and creating digital experiences that deliver concrete and measurable results.
philosophy.paragraph2: We have the <bold>patience to understand</bold> the needs and business cases of your company. We know that the decision to automate processes is difficult - there's an <bold>inertia in the face of innovation</bold> and changing traditional processes can seem intimidating.

innovation.title: Custom Solutions
innovation.description: We develop <bold>personalized solutions</bold> for each client, perfectly adapted to your business needs and objectives.

passion.title: From Excel to Automation
passion.description: We help you transition from manual processes (Excel, pen and paper) to modern solutions that simplify your business and support growth.

collaboration.title: Long-term Partnership
collaboration.description: We work <bold>together</bold> with our clients as partners and provide <bold>maintenance after project completion</bold> - your success is our success.

craftsmanship.title: Diverse Experience
craftsmanship.description: Our combination of experience in <bold>corporations, startups, and freelancing</bold> gives us a complete market perspective.

expertise.title: Technologies & Expertise
expertise.description: Specialized in <bold>modern web technologies</bold> and e-commerce solutions, delivering scalable and performant applications with a focus on user experience and business results.

projects.featuredDescription: A showcase of my recent work, spanning web applications, creative experiments, and open-source contributions.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Features include user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

taskmanager.title: Task Management App
taskmanager.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

weather.title: Weather Dashboard
weather.description: A responsive weather dashboard that displays current conditions and forecasts using external weather APIs with beautiful data visualizations.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A modern portfolio website built with React, Three.js, and Framer Motion featuring 3D animations and smooth scroll effects.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: Have a <bold>project in mind</bold>? I'd love to hear about it. Let's create something amazing together.
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing <bold>new opportunities</bold>, creative projects, or just having a chat about technology and development.
